# uv

> An extremely fast Python package and project manager, written in Rust.

uv is a single tool that replaces pip, pip-tools, pipx, poetry, pyenv, twine, virtualenv, and more. It is 10-100x faster than pip and provides comprehensive project management with a universal lockfile.

## Fetching Documentation

When fetching documentation, use explicit `index.md` paths for directories, e.g., `https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/dependencies/index.md`. This returns clean markdown instead of rendered HTML with JS/CSS.

## Documentation

### Getting Started

- [Installation](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/installation.md): Install uv on macOS, Linux, or Windows
- [First Steps](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/first-steps.md): Quick introduction to using uv
- [Features](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/features.md): Overview of uv's capabilities
- [Help](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/getting-started/help.md): Getting help and reporting issues

### Guides

- [Projects](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/projects.md): Managing Python projects with uv
- [Scripts](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/scripts.md): Running single-file scripts with dependencies
- [Tools](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/tools.md): Installing and running Python CLI tools
- [Installing Python](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/install-python.md): Managing Python versions
- [Packaging](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/package.md): Building and publishing packages

### Integration Guides

- [Docker](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/docker.md): Using uv in Docker containers
- [GitHub Actions](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/github.md): CI/CD with GitHub Actions
- [GitLab CI](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/gitlab.md): CI/CD with GitLab
- [Pre-commit](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/pre-commit.md): Using uv with pre-commit hooks
- [FastAPI](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/fastapi.md): FastAPI project setup
- [Jupyter](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/jupyter.md): Jupyter notebook integration
- [PyTorch](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/pytorch.md): PyTorch installation and configuration
- [AWS Lambda](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/aws-lambda.md): Deploying to AWS Lambda
- [Alternative Indexes](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/alternative-indexes.md): Using custom package indexes
- [Dependency Bots](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/dependency-bots.md): Dependabot and Renovate
- [Marimo](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/marimo.md): Marimo notebook integration
- [Coiled](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/integration/coiled.md): Coiled cloud integration

### Migration

- [Migrating from pip](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/migration/index.md): Guide for migrating from pip workflows
- [pip to Project](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/guides/migration/pip-to-project.md): Converting pip projects to uv projects

### Concepts

- [Concepts Overview](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/index.md): Core uv concepts
- [Projects Overview](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/index.md): Project structure and management
- [Project Layout](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/layout.md): pyproject.toml and lockfile structure
- [Dependencies](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/dependencies.md): Managing project dependencies
- [Workspaces](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/workspaces.md): Multi-package workspaces
- [Project Init](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/init.md): Initializing new projects
- [Running Commands](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/run.md): Running commands in project context
- [Syncing](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/sync.md): Syncing environments with lockfile
- [Building](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/build.md): Building distributions
- [Exporting](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/export.md): Exporting to requirements.txt
- [Configuration](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/projects/config.md): Project configuration options
- [Python Versions](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/python-versions.md): Python version management
- [Resolution](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/resolution.md): Dependency resolution strategies
- [Indexes](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/indexes.md): Package index configuration
- [Cache](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/cache.md): Global cache behavior
- [Tools](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/tools.md): Tool management concepts
- [Build Backend](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/build-backend.md): uv's build backend
- [Configuration Files](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/configuration-files.md): uv.toml and pyproject.toml
- [Preview Features](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/preview.md): Experimental features

### Authentication

- [Authentication Overview](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/authentication/index.md): Authentication methods
- [HTTP Authentication](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/authentication/http.md): HTTP basic auth for indexes
- [CLI Authentication](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/authentication/cli.md): Command-line authentication
- [Git Authentication](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/authentication/git.md): Git repository authentication
- [Certificates](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/authentication/certificates.md): TLS/SSL certificates
- [Third-party Auth](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/concepts/authentication/third-party.md): Keyring and credential helpers

### pip Interface

- [pip Interface Overview](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/pip/index.md): Drop-in pip replacement
- [Dependencies](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/pip/dependencies.md): Declaring dependencies
- [Environments](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/pip/environments.md): Virtual environment management
- [Packages](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/pip/packages.md): Installing packages
- [Compile](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/pip/compile.md): Compiling requirements files
- [Inspection](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/pip/inspection.md): Inspecting environments
- [Compatibility](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/pip/compatibility.md): pip compatibility notes

### Reference

- [CLI Reference](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/cli/): Complete command-line reference
- [Settings Reference](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/settings/): All configuration options
- [Environment Variables](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/environment/): Environment variable reference
- [Storage](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/storage.md): Cache and data storage locations
- [Installer](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/installer.md): Standalone installer details
- [Benchmarks](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/benchmarks.md): Performance benchmarks

### Troubleshooting

- [Troubleshooting](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/troubleshooting/index.md): Common issues and solutions
- [Build Failures](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/troubleshooting/build-failures.md): Resolving build errors
- [Reproducible Examples](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/troubleshooting/reproducible-examples.md): Creating bug reports

### Internals

- [Internals Overview](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/internals/index.md): Implementation details
- [Resolver](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/internals/resolver.md): How the resolver works

- [Policies Overview](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/policies/index.md): Project policies
- [Versioning](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/reference/policies/versioning.md): Version compatibility policy
